15312.content:
"Great! Just step inside.." Tails smiled, knowing that this will be a great experiment.
Shadow strolled inside, the door sliding shut behind him.
"Who exactly am I switching bodies with?" Shadow suddenly asked, as Tails pushed in a few numbers on a pad on the outside of the machine.
"You'll see.." Tails said, locking the machine shut with a pass code.
After making sure it was sealed shut tight, he walked over to the phone on the other side of the room.
"Hello, Sonic?" Tails asked quietly, making sure Shadow wasn't able to hear. "Yea, can you come over? I need you to do me a favor."
Just as he expected, a blue hedgehog rushed into the room under a minute.
"Hey Sonic!" Tails greeted quietly. "You got here fast."
"They don't call me the 'blue blur' for nothing!" Sonic laughed, winking.
There was a sudden pounding of metal that startled them both.
"THAT BETTER NOT BE FAKER I HEAR OUT THERE!" Came a snarl from deep within the pod.
If this were an anime, Tails could have sworn Sonic would have sweat dropped.
"Tails..? What's going on here?"
"I'll tell you in a second, right now I just need you to go into that pod over there." Tails said, pointing to a second pod that was next to the one Shadow had walked into.
Sonic was hesitant, but ultimately gave him a nod and walked un-ordinarily slow into the machine.
The door immediately slide shut behind him, Tails typed in the lock pass code instantly.
"FAKER GET THE FUCK OUT OF THAT POD!" Shadow screamed in fury.
It was clear that he was now punching at the metal from inside, regretting having agreed to doing this in the first place.
"NOW WOULD PROBABLY BE A GOOD TIME TO TELL ME WHAT'S GOING ON!" Sonic shouted, knowing something was wrong if Shadow was acting in such a way.
Tails grabbed a metal controller off of his work table, his heart racing.
What would happen once they switched bodies and they decided to go after him..?
Tails decided to take the risk and switched the top left switch of the controller- causing both of the pods to whirr.
Both hedgehogs inside of the pods screamed as electricity flew throughout the machine; the process ending in 5 minutes...
